overview:
Buenos Aires Accelerator is an integral program for tech startups (web /mobile) Based in Argentina, for global entrepreneurs. The program focused in tech startups with regional and global focus.

They provide:

SEED INVESTMENT: Up to USD 145k in 3 stages to go from idea to international company MENTORING: 50+ of the best business, technical and industry mentors from around the world SERVICES: Inhouse resources in key areas such as Development, Design, Marketing, Monetization, HR, Finance, Fundraising, Legal Counseling, and others. CONTACTS: Local and international connections, including angel investors, VCs, partners, media and more. INTERNATIONALIZATION: Based on partnerships with major accelerators in Silicon Valley, New York, London, Sao Paulo and others, as well as with relevant NGOs. Funding, Mentorship, Business 101, Visibility, work, and work place. Comprehensive program contains three stages, each of 89 days. And each one accompanied by an investment, from $15k usd to $145k usd. Consecutive stages are:

  1. Product Development (MVP)
  2. Investment ready
  3. Internationalization process
